div.head: Literature
div.p: We refer here to other introductory material and online study guides into the TEI and supporting technologies. There is also a section that lists a number of exemplary TEI projects. This is not to say we agree with each of the markup decisions that the project has made. The projects that we refer to however have made available a sizable amount of material, have applied TEI markup based on explicit guidelines, and they make their TEI sources available to the public.

listBibl.bibl: Diary of Robert Graves 1935-39 and ancillary material, Graves, Robert (1895-1985), compiled by Beryl Graves, C.G. Petter, L.R. Roberts. University of Victoria Libraries, Victoria B.C., Canada. 2002
